titles.title: Providing a correction in the enrollment of S. 540.
Providing a correction in the enrollment of S. 540.

action.text: Mr. Harper asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Directs the Secretary of the Senate to correct the enrollment of S. 540 by amending the title.
